basic_information.scholarship_name: Bill and Ann Cather Endowed Scholarship in Teacher Education
basic_information.committee_name: CEPS - Bill and Ann Cather Endowed Scholarship in

description: Scholarship Mission: To provide scholarship assistance to any education major within the College of Education & Professional Studies who is pursuing a career in education. Eligibility Requirements Undergraduate student within the College of Education and Professional Studies Must be admitted to the Teacher Education Program 2.5 GPA or higher In a short essay, please share how you intend to serve in the Oklahoma Public School system after graduation Recipient must be in the semester of student teaching when award is received Selection Process Recipients of the scholarship will be selected by a departmental committee Award Requirements Must be enrolled in the upcoming fall and spring semester to receive award Attendance at an awards banquet is required for all recipients Recipients must write a thank you letter to the donors of the scholarship

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration

hard_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship
